content:
DsmlErrorProcessing Enum

Definition

The DsmlErrorProcessing enumeration specifies how to proceed when an error occurs.

In this Article

public enum DsmlErrorProcessing
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
DsmlErrorProcessing

Fields

Exit

Exit. Value is equal to 1.
Resume

Resume. Value is equal to 0.
